Alim Al Islam's web pageSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationI am a Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) in Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology (BUET), Dhaka, Bangladesh. I have been teaching and doing research in CSE, BUET since February, 2007.
